    • Uses of GameEvent in eftaios.model.managers

      Methods in eftaios.model.managers that return GameEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameEvent PlayerManager.attack(Player attacker, boolean canAlienIncreaseSpeed)
      Function that performs the attack request of a player First it checks for every player that he has the same position of the attacked sector.
      GameEvent TurnManager.beginTurn(java.util.List<Player> playersArray)
      Function that select a new player to start the turn, saves it to the currentPlayer variable, and then returns a GameEvent checking if it's the last turn of the game, the first, or a normal turn Also, resets all the stats of the player by calling a specific function (resetPlayer sets the moves the flags for attacking and everything else)
      GameEvent PlayerManager.giveItemsTo(Player player, java.util.List<Item> itemsList)
      Function that is invoked when the player has too many items and one must be removed from his deck.
      GameEvent GameBoardManager.movePlayer(Player player, java.lang.String destination)
      Function that executes the move request of a player.
